DataElement.preferredName: Patient Medical Care Travel Time Period Distance Mile Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Distance in number of miles that a patient states were traveled for medical care during a specific time period.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Medical Care Travel Time Period Distance
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The actions of prevention, treatment, and management of illness and the preservation of mental and physical well-being through the services offered by the medical and allied health professions._The act of going from one place to another._An interval of time._The space separating two objects or points.
